content:
# The movement to the position (15, -10) was successful. This indicates that my movement commands are functioning correctly, but the issue with the player position still persists.

# I will now attempt to move to a position even closer to the coal resource, incrementally approaching it to see if this affects my ability to place the stone furnace.

# Moving closer to the coal resource.
move_to(Position(x=20, y=-12))  # Move to a point closer to the coal position.
